Package org.tquadrat.foundation.testutil

@API(status=STABLE, since="0.0.1") package org.tquadrat.foundation.testutil
Classes that are meant to support the writing of JUnit tests.
Open Issues (The ToDo List):

    Package
    Description
    org.tquadrat.foundation.testutil.impl
    The implementations of some common interfaces that are sometimes used in the tests.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    TestBaseClass
    A base class for JUnit test classes.
    TestDataBase<E>
    This class is meant as the base class for test data records.
    TestUtils
    Some methods that are useful in the context of testing.
